website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost way to get an 18x wide-angle lens, the Fujifilm FinePix S2950 delivers merely OK photos and shooting performance.
pros: The Fujifilm FinePix S2950 has a wide-angle 18x zoom lens, takes AA-size batteries for power, and has a 3-inch LCD, an electronic viewfinder, and manual and semimanual shooting modes
cons: The S2950's performance and photo quality indoors and in low-light conditions are merely passable for its price

customer_reviews.title: It does not replace my old FinePixS8000fd by a long shot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old S8000fd. It doesn't do a very good job. The lens is cheaper and won't zoom well. The clarity of the pics is not up to the old quality; the auction mode is no longer there; and overall it is a disappointment. There are more issues with it but to get to the bottom line: i would not recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: kate e.

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 years
customer_reviews.text: This was a great camera while it lasted, but I thought it should have lasted longer than 3 1/2 years for the money that was spent. Bought Feb 11, 2012 and in July 2015 it started slowing down. It still works, but now takes longer to display the picture on the screen and makes a whirring noise when you take the picture, almost as if it's groaning from old age. Yesterday, August 22, I began having a little difficulty convincing the shutter button to capture the picture as it would take 2-3 tries before it did so. I will continue using this camera until it dies, as I can't currently afford to spend another $200-$300 for another camera.
customer_reviews.author: musicofthelight

customer_reviews.title: It takes great pictures but I can't hear my videos and camera ...
customer_reviews.text: It takes great pictures but I can't hear my videos and camera shuts off randomly and then it's a hassle to get it back on. It'll say my batteries are dying even bough I put brand new ones in
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Cool FinePix
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Camera - Just the right weight - not too light and not too heavy. The LCD screen is large enough to be able to view your photos. The only problem is - Watch out for the battery door. It is so flimsy that it seems to be hanging on a thread. Whoever invented this was not too clever. A better system would have been like the old Fuji cameras where the XD or SD card was in a separate chamber. This is why I did not rate the camera five stars. Otherwise. for this inexpensive price you got yourself a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my husband for Christmas a few years ago. He is a realtor and needs to take pictures of the houses he is selling but also likes to dabble in photography. We weren't willing to shell out all the money for a real DSLR for him to just play with but this one works well. Its significantly better than his cell phone camera and he enjoys using it. Takes good pictures and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: this camera Its okay
customer_reviews.text: the camera looks very professional, quality materials, making it tough, has a good zoom and many modes and scenes to take photos, but ultimately the quality of the photos is not as good, the photos do not have bright colors, is seen as opaque even have photos of cameras compared to other brands that are less professional and these are more alive and better quality, for the price I think it's okay but not as good as it looks. thats my oppinion
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm FinePix S2950 14 MP
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic camera! It takes really great, sharp photos and has lot of features. The menu and options are easy to use, and so far, the battery life with regular AA batteries is outstanding. I have been using the camera for several weeks with the same set of batteries. I have been shopping for a new camera for over a year, but just couldn't stand the $500 or more price tag on other cameras with similar features. This is a great buy for under $200.
customer_reviews.author: goodmill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This camera has so many capabilities and is easy to use. It is comfortable to hold so remains steady. It takes 4 AA lithium batteries which are easy to obtain and comes with a plug in charger. I did download an online bound manual as there are so many choices you can make. It's fun to use and experiment with and has an excellent rating. I would highly recommend this camera for someone who has some photography experience.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy A. Brock

customer_reviews.title: No problems with the camera and I've used it to its max potential and it's still operating like it's new
customer_reviews.text: Camera arrived on time in an unopened box. Everything that tit said it cmwould come with, came with it. No problems with the camera and I've used it to its max potential and it's still operating like it's new!
customer_reviews.author: Rhomel

customer_reviews.title: ... it having a view finder and versatility and taking good pictures, but gave it a 4 because it ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it a 5 for it having a view finder and versatility and taking good pictures, but gave it a 4 because it is slow when going from focus to snapping pictures and often that means the picture is gone by the time the camera responds with the shutter.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Marshall

customer_reviews.title: My first, but I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first SLR Camera so even though I've had it for about 2 months now I'm still learning new things about it every time I take it out. It's very easy to figure out, thankfully since the index that comes with it has minimal information in it. I've used it in nature shots, family get together, animals, and water shots. All have turned out spectacular! I would recommend this for an easy to use novice SLR camera user, and I'm sure it works just as well for a mature photographer as well.
customer_reviews.author: AmberH4

customer_reviews.title: NOTICE: THIS IS NOT A DSRL. Good for price.
customer_reviews.text: Please, customers must know what they are buying before making a mistake. The price tells you everything. For a lot less than 200, you receive a good quality BRIDGE camera. A lot of extras and cool stuff like panorama. Excellent zoom! If you want to make a step foward, go from normal small digital cameras, to a more complete camera. This is your choise. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Javier

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera, bought for my 12 year budding photo journalist. She can't wait for school to start so she can help with the school yearbook.
customer_reviews.author: G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performance
customer_reviews.text: Tough to write technical reviews for a tech-based product that will be out-moded in a year or so. Suffice to say, the FujiFIlm FinePix2950 is a solid performer. Quality images, decent features, good battery life. It's not a pocket point-and-shoot and it's not a DSLR, but something in-between that shoots finepix!
customer_reviews.author: P. B. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm FinePix S2950 14 MP . Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get this camera and experiment before i make the jump to an SLR andi'm glad i did. This camera has fantastic features for the price. Picture quality is on par with what i expected and this is just using th Automatic settings. Can't wait to drill down and use manual settings. Body may be a bit small for those with large hands, but i ain't complaining. This was/is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: learning takes a while
customer_reviews.text: i like the fuifilm fine pix camera so far. the pictures are clear and the color good. i found that sometimes when i am at 16x the camera just doesn't work or is very fuzzy.. i wish i had known that there wasn't a booklet with the camera. the disc is fine but i have no reference when i am not near the computer.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for any photographer
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly great camera. The battery compartment is extremely easy to operate, unlike the previous canon I owned. The pictures that you can take with this camera are of insanely good quality - the video is also pretty good. The macro mode is a feature I use a lot for close-ups of plants. The panorama capability is a nice little gadget, but i don't think i'll ever really use it. Also, the menus are very easy to navigate. There are a ton of features I didn't mention, as i'm still trying to master the manual mode. Overall, this is an amazing product that i would surely buy again. Just make sure to bet a warranty, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Feedback
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking pictures (But I prefer all of my pictures be taken in flash with this one) Really exceptional with the HD videos, I am always recording rehearsals and concept choreography projects as a dancer so this bad boy comes in EXTRA handy. Not so big and bulky, great for a startup camera. Can't be used with any double A batteries, must be heavy duty double A or it will die in a matter of 5 minutes of use. (I've experienced it and I hate it) Definitely recommend rechargeable batteries. I need to invest in some myself!
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter, who is taking photography in high school. As soon as she opened it, she creamed, Camera 4! This is one of the cameras they use in class, and apparently this is the class favorite. They rush to class to get this one. So enough said, I am her hero for getting this camera. She has been using it constantly every since.
customer_reviews.author: Rseneff

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera does all it claims to do, it takes great pics just be sure to learn navigating the menu, it has a lot features and you don't want to miss any of them. My only complaint is that like any non SLR they fail miserably in the action shot area, if the subject is moving it's only going to be a clear shot about half the time. Very nice still shots though.
customer_reviews.author: Dave R. Pylman

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm FinePix S2950 14 MP Digital Camera with Fujinon 18x Wide Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch LCD
customer_reviews.text: The Fujifilm FinePix S2950 14 MP Digital Camera with Fujinon 18x Wide Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch LCD has really pretty design, solid construction. Has a lot of features and the quality of the pictures and videos are really great for the price. Really good deal. Thank You...
customer_reviews.author: Miguel SR

customer_reviews.title: I have not been overly happy with the focus
customer_reviews.text: Its a decent camera. I have not been overly happy with the focus. Many pics are not of high quality despite the "auto focus". If I were to do it over, I would go with a cannon.
customer_reviews.author: WinstonMagoo

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with transaction and promptness! Camera in great condition and arrived undamaged. Recommend ordering from this vendor. The camera itself however was a poor choice of mine as it gives very blurry pics even on automatic. I use my phone camera more than I use this. Too bad, the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Croan

customer_reviews.title: Fugi
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Fugiflim S2950 And so far seems to be a great camera for the price,and takes great pictures ,fits nice to the hand. And a big thing for me is the electronic view finder.I have had cameras with out it and it is real hard to take pitchers on a black screen on a sunny day.I will not buy them again. Thank you. R.M.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mid size camera. Intuitive knobs. Great close ups. It even came with rechargeable batteries. There was only one, so you probably can't get it again at this price from this seller. I was lucky. Damage proof packing.
customer_reviews.author: GoodBuyForLife

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the price, but if you want to take really amazing photos, save up for a dslr. I have used dslr cameras of the same brand and they are far better. Granted, they run more like $800-1000.
customer_reviews.author: slowponyhome

customer_reviews.title: Quick Help
customer_reviews.text: The camera arrived quickly but I was disconcerted that the proprietary USB cable Fuji Film uses was absent. I called the company and they quickly responded by crediting my account the cost of a new cable. Great customer service that fixed my problem to the best of their ability since the cable is not sold separately by them. I would definitely recommend this company not only for their low prices, but the quality of their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: great camera ive gotten some great images off this camera ...
customer_reviews.text: great camera ive gotten some great images off this camera before I bought my dslr some years ago I still own it and use it
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. Uses AA batteries. Takes good photos. Small and easy to carry. Does not pull on my neck as my previous, heavier cameras did. I have taken many photos indoors w/o flash.
customer_reviews.author: Marietta Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: East to use. Have not used the more manually driven features, but the built-in automatic features are straight-forward and produce lovely results. I had to download the operating manual from the FujiPhoto site, however, as my netbook does not have a drive for the CD roduct package. A slight hassle, but one becoming more common with the popularity of netbooks and tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Camus

customer_reviews.title: Not dissatisfied, but I'm selling it
customer_reviews.text: I took this camera to Europe for six weeks and now I'm selling it. It's not that I'm dissatisfied, it's just that this camera taught me what I truly wanted in a super-zoom camera. I discovered that I use a camera like this as a video camera as much as a still camera -- maybe more. As a video camera it only shoots 720px HD, and the zoom (which loses focus while filming) isn't useful. As a still camera, it's hard to beat for the money. I especially like the viewfinder: viewfinders are a necessity in bright sunshine. I hardly used the LCD (for shooting) at all. Au revoir, Dear Fuji. You did a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Portland Tom

customer_reviews.title: A Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my son's girlfriend. She loves it. She wears the batteries out on it very quickly when she is in town to visit. They live out of state. So, it was well worth seeing her happy. Thank You Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Hemo

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera for use at work to make catalogues and also for making a huge 8mts x 4mts road advertisement. It is working great and I am very happy with it. Great pictures, small price, great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great canera
customer_reviews.text: I love the features of this camera and the shipping was well done and fast to arrive. I ordered this because I dropped and broke my last one but this is a great camera that takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: Say cheese!
customer_reviews.text: I thought my 5 yr. old Fuji Finepix 3800 digital camera was good, but this S2950 is so much better, and cost me about 50% less than the old one. Wide angle lens alone makes a huge difference when shooting cars. This camera also has both a thru the lens and 3 inch LCD view finder. Panorama feature is so easy to use and fun, too!
customer_reviews.author: Larry  Sementini

customer_reviews.title: it takes good pics.
customer_reviews.text: the instruction book could be improved for novices. it takes good pics.
customer_reviews.author: honest dude

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, and a Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this from a little kodak point and shoot digital camera. I wanted to step into the world of digital SLR's, but I didn't have the funding for that yet. So, I looked into one of these. It's everything I was looking for, at a better than expected price. It takes some really nice shots, especially if you get to learn the settings a bit. I haven't discovered any downsides to this camera yet. I can't wait to take this on one of my hikes!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Quality provider
customer_reviews.text: I would highly reccomend using this provider, we purchased a refurbished product but it came in a secure box and works wonderful, it was a good Chirstmas present and arrived in good time
customer_reviews.author: KAW

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures
customer_reviews.text: I need a camera with wide angle shots and would recover faster than the one I had. works great automatically or manually. Nice camera for the money
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awsome camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good camera. the pics are sharp and clear and has very good manual settings, if you are going to use video, the audio isnt that good, but i use the video for skate videos on youtube and its pretty good, if you want some examples just check our channel and every video clip without fish eye is the fuji film, just look up kook-eye skateboarding on youtube our channel is kook eye and i think you will like the performance
customer_reviews.author: meep

customer_reviews.title: Takes great photos outside BUT indoors photos are bad
customer_reviews.text: Takes great photos outside BUT indoors photos are bad. Absolutely must use flash. Flash is not adequate. Does not have a CMOS detector which is a must for taking photos in low light.
customer_reviews.author: Nillor

customer_reviews.title: Good easy to use and does the job of a movie camera also. this is my second one as the first one was destroid when our house bur
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are unlike many other cameras as they will take Approx. 300 pictures on one set of batteries. I use rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.author: Gene Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for the money. Surprising amount of features at this price level. Takes nice photos and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother who wanted a point and shoot camera with many megapixles. This worked great for her, it's very durable and the battery life is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Wanzi

customer_reviews.title: New camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera as a direct replacement to one I had from last year that failed after a launch into the pool. I missed the camera so bad I had to have a replacement. Not only did I find the replacement it was the exact same camera, it was over $100.00 less in price. I am quite happy with the new camera and there were no hick ups in the ordering at all. Every step was smooth and effective-SDH1903
customer_reviews.author: SDH1903

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: In excellent condition for being used. It even came with a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas and I love it. Great for the price. It takes fool proof pictures and is lite weight. Have had this a year now and still like it. works great.
customer_reviews.author: sferron1

customer_reviews.title: Love...
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Only use on special occasions. Very good pictures, sturdy & light for it's size. Would get another.
customer_reviews.author: William David Woods

customer_reviews.title: Alsome
customer_reviews.text: I both for my daughter she loves it outstanding pictures moving or not. The only thing you have to buy a memory card but no problem.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike this camera. Eats up battery life way to fast. Actions photos are too blurry even in sports mode.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cloutier

customer_reviews.title: Fugi camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this Camera. I am still trying to learn how to use it. There are so many things to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Good enough camera for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: It was a good buy. The flash is poor. All else is good so far. I would recommend for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Lul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great pictures great movies. simple to use, My wife and I both find it easy to use indoors and out in all lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky1

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great package and very worth the money paid! Shipped fast and just what I needed! Great! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MA Student

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this camera 2 years ago. figured it was a good camera with the name alone. Does not take good pictures,. The picture are ok but for the money I would expect a lot clearer. Also the time between each photo is so long. I would NOT recommend this camera at all.
customer_reviews.author: keith wittman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera and have taken many beautiful pictures with it! Definitely a great camera for someone with beginner/intermediate skills.
customer_reviews.author: Ellinj

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice camera, only two things I wish were different, 1 changeable lens to achive longer distance and 2 Automatic Flash, you have to pull it up every time in order to take a picture with it, but besides that is a nice camera!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Jose Oviedo

customer_reviews.title: Decent outdoor photos
customer_reviews.text: Camera only takes good photos outside in good ambient lighting. Inside photos, no matter what setting or configuration, are horrible. My old Sony 5MP take WAY better photos indoors than this one. This camera is obviously meant strictly for outdoor usage and even then, it's not fantastic, just decent. But what more can you ask, you really get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Spork Dude

customer_reviews.title: SUPER NICE CAMERA AT A NICE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: My other camera was an Olympus 4mp, the first digital I ever bought. This camera is like comparing a Swiss Army knife to a butter knife! Very well made, a lot of features, and works great! I do a lot of EBay stuff and a digital camera is a must. I made do with the Olympus far too long.
customer_reviews.author: M Squared

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is really good, a lot of features, easy to use, luxurious and nice looking, and good price also.
customer_reviews.author: Eka Aditya

customer_reviews.title: Luv it!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is exactly what I wanted. Still have tons to learn on "how to use" properly. The zoom is amazing...captures my birds easily. Have taken pix thru storm door, and they were as clear as if outside! Friends helped me choose this camera...they were "dead on" for what I needed. Looking fwd to years of fun w/this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Margiea

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm FinePix S2950 14MP
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, amazing zoom both in photo and in video, easy to use, you should buy the kid cleaning, I recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: The price very low with the features this camera has. A great acquisition... Images are very sharp, the flash is one-of-a-kind, is the best camera I've ever had
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Camera came on time in perfect condition. It was a Christmas gift for my wife but I gave it to her early so she could use it during the holidays. She went crazy with it! We live on a tropical island so she was always going to the beach and the rain forest to take photos. The quality of the photos and the zoom were amazing. Great features especially for the price. Would think cause it uses 4 batteries it would wste alot of power but it doesn't! I bought some Walgreens Alkaline Batteries that were on sale and I used those babies for almost a week of non-stop photo sessions. No cons yet. It's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky V

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this camera for over a year and I can tell you it is not worth the money. It is horrible in low light conditions and pictures are grainy during the day. It eats batteries like crazy and image stabilization is a joke. I seldom use this camera anymore because the pictures are horrible. Yes, I know how to take pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS CAMERA!!! It's a wonderful camera, love the digital zoom and an easy to use with it's different settings. I would buy and give them as a wonderful gift!!! Thanks Amazon Group!!!!
customer_reviews.author: N2OBS

customer_reviews.title: all ok,
customer_reviews.text: all ok, the only thing this camera is that the display has a minimal, almost invisible dead pixels, that is their only detail, takes great pictures, great quality camera, very nice has nothing to envy any other, the pictures you take are top quality and amazing videos .. a wonderful hd quality
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take reference photos for painting. I am no photographer! For my purposes this camera works well. It is light and easy to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Edwards

customer_reviews.title: A great value!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera to hold us over until we bought a DSLR. Basically this camera is perfect for our needs. It takes great pictures right out of the box, everything works very well, very intuitive. We even dropped it on ceramic tile and it didn't even scratch it (lucky). I'm recommending it to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Boulevard1970

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is among the cameras of its kind, the range is a good opportunity to capture important moments, is robust allowing a long life, the downside is the reeplazo of AA batteries which bothers use, otherwise I'm satisfied with the quality-value
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camerai
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas. We were both very very satisfied with the look of the product and the performance. It takes wonderful pictures, I was quite surprised for such a cheap camera to do such a great job. Very very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a pretty good camera. Picture quality is good in decent lighting. I think this camera is perfect for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Charlo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera - I have had it for awhile now and it takes great pictures! My only issue is the telescopic button sticks and I have to mess with it from time to time. Other than that it is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cole

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great item. For the price this item is well worth it. Its been over a year and this travels with me everywhere, diaper bag and purse and it has yet to break.
customer_reviews.author: PinkLady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is awesome... had the early model 10mp. This also was a great camera but got stolen. The outdoor pictures are great. However the indoor pictures need more work. Still working on how to perfect them. But for the price and what you get... you can not beat it. I would buy another Fuji and I have already recommended it to a fried who also purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the good cameras .
customer_reviews.text: If we will compare with a price which is I payed for this camera , I wish to say that it's perfect camera . Light , lot of settings and operations, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: David Khositashvili

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: wasn't what I was expecting but hopefully it'll get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for lite-weight point & shoot -- perfect for type of photography i do;  great features on it! Would recommend to ot
customer_reviews.text: FinePix 2950 good camera; love the features it has and nice light-weight feel to it. Great zoom for close-up pictures! Highly recommend to friends if looking for small lightweight point & shoot. Suits my needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: susan miller

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAM!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. It does exactly what I need it to do. Theres not too many dslr cam's that does what this does at this price. Before wasting time and money, I did my research on youtube and on other sites. THANKS AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: CAM LOVE

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this camera and so far I love it, it does everything I need and more, would recommend it to a friend!! Shipping was fantastic, 2 days by fed-ex!! Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: dpd

customer_reviews.title: Good solid camera
customer_reviews.text: I like it. You can get your hands on this camera. I like to use this camera when taking family still shots. I carry a little nikon on my belt so as to sneak a photo now and then. Five stars says I love it. I not love no camera.
customer_reviews.author: william s.

customer_reviews.title: For those getting the turn off/on message...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality camera and has been very useful, that is, until we ran into the common turn on/off error message from this models. We solved this by applying the manufacturer's firmware update available here: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Pilsen Wellness Center

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was more than I expected, I am truly happy with my purchase! The quality is best outside but when you use it inside it isn't bad either. The price is such a steal, I LOVE IT!!! I recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Oxford_girl

customer_reviews.title: great camera for great price
customer_reviews.text: I am not a camera person but I got this one to get a better zoom, more pixels, and other fun features. Although it is bulky the zoom is fantastic and it is a great transitional camera from little pt and shoot to DSLR. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vater

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, nice panoramic
customer_reviews.text: Nice for price, takes a good panoramic. Easy to use. Seems to work well with motion as took some shots while on a boat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Muni

customer_reviews.author: Black Friday P.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a bargain for the price. It takes great pictures with ease. The number of useful features is way beyond what I expected to get. The controls are logically located and very reachable. One particularly practical feature is that it automatically pushes off the lens cap when you turn it on so no more completely black shots. Do yourself a favor and get one if you're looking for an easy to use high quality camera. I'm very satisfied with my choice. Clifford Graham
customer_reviews.author: CRG in Redding

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Has held up to expectations. No problems great deal very satisfied. Love the quality and the price was just right.

product_meta.title: Fujifilm FinePix S2950 14 MP Digital Camera with Fujinon 18x Wide Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 3-Inch LCD
product_meta.description:
The Finepix S2950 camera boasts a high resolution 14 megapixel CCD, a bright 3.0" LCD screen (460K dot resolution) plus viewfinder, and award winning Fujinon optics equipped with a 18X Optical Zoom.The Finepix S2950 is also intuitive and easy to operate, and packed full of useful features and technologies. With its mega 28mm wide-angle to 504mm telephoto lens, the S2950 can capture a wide variety of shots. The S2950 also features a mechanically stabilized 14 megapixel CCD sensor and high ISO sensitivity settings which combine to offer Fujifilm’s Dual Image Stabilization technology.This combination reduces the blurring effects in many shooting conditions. Also Panorama mode, HD movie, Face Detection, and Easy Web Uploader combine with a host of other features to make the Finepix S2950 a feature-packed and versatile shooter for virtually any photographer.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Fujifilm's SLR-style FinePix S2950 digital camera delivers 14 megapixels, a FUJINON 18x zoom lens, as well as dual image stabilization. It also features a large 3-inch LCD, an Electronic Viewfinder, plus a number of image and social features allowing enthusiasts and professionals alike the ability to capture crisp, clear shots up-close, wide and far away. 

Fujifilm FinePix S2950 Highlights 

FUJINON Zoom Lens and Dual Image Stabilization for Sharp, Clear Shots
The FinePix S2950 packs an 18x zoom with an impressive wide angle 28mm-504mm high-precision FUJINON optical lens in a simple-to-operate zoom lever, allowing a huge range to capture every detail, whether shooting stills or movies. With the combination of the mechanically stabilized sensor and high ISO, blurring effects of both hand-shake and subject movement are reduced to provide superb pictures. 

Stunning Panoramic Shots
The FinePix S2950 features the easy-to-use Motion Panorama shooting mode, which takes three successive shots with a helpful tool which automatically releases the shutter once the images are fully aligned to seamlessly stitch the shots together in-camera. No matter how basic the photographer's skill, this feature allows users to get creative and see impressive results with no fear of uneven landscapes or shaky horizons. 

HD Movie Capture
Capture stunning movies in 720p with sound at 30 frames per second with one touch ease. With a mini-HDMI output connector, it is easy to connect and view images on your HDTV (HDMI cable not included). 

Perfect Pictures Every Time with Smile and Blink Detection 
Smile Detection recognizes the moment your subject smiles and releases the shutter only when this happens, ensuring a happy photo every time. Additionally the Blink Detection function warns you if any of your subjects have blinked so that you can re-take the photo if necessary. 

Social Networking and Photo book Features
In-camera tagging capabilities for both Facebook and YouTube, allowing you to select photos and movies for upload on either of the sites, making for easy upload once you connect to a PC and launch MyFinePix Studio. The feature saves you time and enables you to share your special moments with your closest social network. 

The FinePix S2950 also allows you to tag in-camera the images you want to feature in a Photo book, which can be viewed separately in-camera and later created and ordered in a Photo book quickly and seamlessly. 

Additional Features


 * Tracking Auto Focus (AF): Tracks fast moving subjects so they don't escape from the frame in a blur. Subjects will be tracked automatically for as long as it is kept in the frame and the shutter is half-pressed; when users fully press the shutter button your subject will be in the centre of the photo in perfect focus. 
 * i-Flash Intelligent Flash: Offers a flash control system which efficiently controls the level of flash for a given exposure to produce beautifully balanced flash illumination across the foreground and background. Gone are the ugly washout shots where the subject is blasted with light and the background dark and unexposed. 
 * Full Manual Controls: Gives the user the choice of direct access to manually control the settings and shooting features, and the specially designed chassis includes dedicated command buttons for quick and easy key functions. 
 * Instant Zoom/Zoom Bracketing: Useful for high level photography. The Instant Zoom function captures moving subjects at high zoom settings. After zooming on a subject, a single button gives an additional 1.4x or 2x digital zoom. Zoom Bracketing automatically captures the same image three times with zoom ratio settings of 1x, 1.4x and 2x with a single shutter release. 
 * Continuous Shooting: Allows up to 8 fps for 20 frames in S mode. 
 * AA-Battery Power: Using AA batteries is convenient for on-the-go digital camera users as it eliminates the need to charge battery packs, allowing for lots of picture-taking and the ease of battery replacement.
feature_bullets: 14-megapixel CCD sensor; 18x wide-angle optical zoom lens
Easy upload to Facebook and YouTube
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
